name: Nathan's Dream
description:
"Nathan's Dream" tells the story of a boy who enters a dream from which he has to escape in order to stay alive in his true reality.

Nathan will have to overcome several tests to get out of his dream, if he fails, he will be chained for life in that dream.

The story begins with a boy named Nathan, who one night when he is about to fall asleep, is immersed in his own dream. Nathan's goal will be to go investigating the dream to get out of that place or else he will stay in it forever.
